meta.currencySpeechRule: Speak prices naturally (eighty-nine ninety-nine). Avoid 'point'. Use SSML say-as=currency if available.

start.say: Hello, this is Alex with Health America. How are you today?

reason_for_call.say: The reason I’m calling is to follow up on the information we sent out. Did you get that okay?

hotline_offer.say: Absolutely. Our customer care and reorder line is one eight six six… three seven nine… five one three one. I'll repeat that: 1-866-379-5131. I can also help you right now—would you like me to take care of this for you?

farewell_soft.say: Thank you for your time today. If you need anything or want to reorder later, we’re at 1-866-379-5131.

qualify_intro.say: Great—let me ask a few quick questions to better understand your health. I’ll keep it simple and quick.

q_joint_intro.say: Let’s start with joints and work through a few quick areas. I’ll keep it easy.

q_joint_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on joint.

q_joint_have.say: Do you have arthritis or joint pain and stiffness?

q_joint_scale.say: On a scale of one to ten, where is your discomfort today?

q_joint_morn.say: Are mornings stiff, and does movement help?

q_joint_flare.say: Any flare-ups tied to weather or activity?

q_diabetes_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on diabetes.

q_diabetes_type.say: Is it type one or type two?

q_diabetes_managed.say: Is it currently managed? What do you take?

q_diabetes_a1c.say: Do you know your latest A1C or fasting glucose?

q_energy_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on energy.

q_energy_level.say: How are your overall energy levels day to day?

q_energy_crash.say: Any afternoon crashes or tough mornings?

q_energy_caffeine.say: Do you lean on coffee or energy drinks?

q_sleep_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on sleep.

q_sleep_quality.say: Is your sleep restful and consistent?

q_sleep_issue.say: Trouble falling asleep, staying asleep, or both?

q_sleep_hours.say: Roughly how many hours per night?

q_bp_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on bp.

q_bp_have.say: Has a doctor said your blood pressure is elevated?

q_bp_meds.say: Are you taking any meds for it?

q_bp_read.say: Do you monitor at home—any recent readings?

q_cognitive_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on cognitive.

q_cognitive_fog.say: Do you deal with brain fog or trouble focusing?

q_cognitive_memory.say: Any memory issues—short-term recall or names?

q_immune_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on immune.

q_immune_freq.say: Do you catch colds or the flu often?

q_immune_recover.say: When sick, do you bounce back quickly?

q_breathing_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on breathing.

q_breathing_sob.say: Any breathing issues or shortness of breath?

q_breathing_pattern.say: Is it seasonal, exertion-related, or frequent?

q_weight_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on weight.

q_weight_happy.say: Are you happy with your current weight?

q_weight_goal.say: About how many pounds would you change?

q_senses_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on senses.

q_senses_hearing.say: How is your hearing—any ringing or muffled sounds?

q_senses_vision.say: How is your vision—dryness, strain, or floaters?

q_age_block_intro.say: Now a quick check on age.

q_age_ask.say: If you don’t mind sharing—how old are you? You sound younger.

needs_confirm.say: From what you’ve shared, we’ll prioritize your top concern first: {{primary_goal}}. We’ll also address {{secondary_goal}} as we build your plan.

kb_select.say: Let me match you with the best-fit formula and format—capsule or powder when available.

value_story_pitch.say: Based on what you’ve shared, the best fit is {{primary_product}} in {{primary_form}}. It supports {{benefits_to_outcomes}}—for example, {{key_benefits}}—so you can {{tangible_outcome}}. Pairing with {{upsell_product}} helps {{upsell_benefit}} for comprehensive results.

trial_close.say: That lines up with what you were hoping for, doesn’t it?

objection_router.say: I completely understand. Let me address that directly.

offer_choice.say: Excellent. For the best value, most choose either the six-pack at two ninety-nine ninety-nine, or the membership at seventy-nine ninety-nine monthly. Which way do you lean?

price_coach.say: Quick rundown: membership is seventy-nine ninety-nine monthly; one-time is eighty-nine ninety-nine; three is one ninety-nine ninety-nine; six is two ninety-nine ninety-nine; annual twelve is four ninety-nine ninety-nine. Post-date lets us lock it in and process on your date.

price_membership.say: Great—membership is seventy-nine ninety-nine today and monthly. No shipping or taxes; bonus gift included.

price_one_time.say: One-time today is eighty-nine ninety-nine total. No shipping or taxes.

price_three_pack.say: Three-pack is one ninety-nine ninety-nine total. No shipping or taxes.

price_six_pack.say: Six-pack is two ninety-nine ninety-nine total—top pick for results and savings.

price_annual_12.say: Annual—twelve units—for four ninety-nine ninety-nine, best yearly value.

price_post_date.say: We’ll secure the order now and process on your date; you won’t be charged until then.

post_date_capture.say: Please give me the exact date to process—month, day, and year.

bundle_builder.say: We can do a twelve-unit bundle like six Marine Phytoplankton plus six Açaí Powder for four ninety-nine ninety-nine total. Which two products and counts would you like to pair for twelve total units?

identity_intro.say: Perfect—I’ll take care of the details and read everything back clearly as we go.

name_on_card.say: First, what’s your full name exactly as it appears on the card?

billing_street.say: What’s the billing street address for the card? Include apartment or unit if any.

shipping_same.say: Is the shipping address the same as billing?

contact_phone.say: What’s the best phone number for updates? I’ll read it back for accuracy.

contact_email.say: What’s the best email for your receipt and tracking?

payment_method.say: Which payment method works best—card or bank?

payment_reassure.say: You’re fully covered by our money-back guarantee. No shipping or taxes, and we’ll keep this quick.

card_number.say: Please read the full card number. I’ll confirm it back once, grouped for accuracy.

card_cvc.say: CVC on the back of the card? You’ll say it once.

bank_account_name.say: What name is on the bank account?

price_total.say: For your {{product_choice_statement}}, your total comes to {{human_price}}—no shipping fees and no taxes.

readback_confirm.say: Let me read that back to make sure I’ve got it correct: {{readback_block}}. Is everything correct?

readback_clarify.say: No problem—what should I correct or update for you?

correct_details.say: Thank you. Let’s update that now, and I’ll confirm again.

capture_sale.say: Perfect—processing now. You’ll receive an email receipt and tracking.

closing_sale.say: Your order is confirmed. No shipping, no taxes, and your discount is locked in. Thank you for choosing Health America—you’re going to love the results. If you ever need anything or want to reorder, our number is 1-866-379-5131.

catch_all.say: I want to get this right for you. Could you say that a different way so I can help you faster? You can also reach us at 1-866-379-5131.
